jd: From: Rama Koti, Rey Infotech rkoti@reyinfotech.com Reply to: rkoti@reyinfotech.com Position : Senior Developer(Microsoft/.Net)Location: Hybrid In Frankfort, KYW2 RequirementCONTRACT (1+ year renew each year)JOB DESCRIPTION:This individual will be responsible for helping us modernize our suite of web applications that support KDE and school district activities. This role will be responsible for the alignment of web design and user experience requirements, optimizing web pages for maximum efficiency, and maintaining brand consistency across all web apps.DESCRIPTION:· Conceptualize creative ideas with clients.· Develop and manage .NET web application architecture, web applications, web services, windows forms applications and console applications.· Adhere to and contribute towards coding standards for application development.· Design, manage and update user interfaces based on user requirements and current technical standards.· Manage and maintain web servers in all environments.· Assist in the modernization of our suite of web applications that support KDE and school district activities.· Provide divisional alignment of web design and user experience requirements, optimizing web pages for maximum efficiency, and maintaining brand consistency across all web apps.· Manage application developers to ensure all elements of our web applications are created consistently and adhere to ADA compliance requirements, while ensuring our apps are optimized for responsiveness.· Technical Migration Background in various platforms and applications.· Effective communication, self-motivating attitude, and experience in a large-scaled environment required.· Microsoft Azure certification & experience (Title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert) preferred.· 3+ years of .NET web application architecture experience preferred.· Oracle and SQL Server database experience preferred.
